summary: All three requirements from the BuildRequest have been implemented in the diff. REQ-1 (footer settings error fix) is addressed through comprehensive FooterManager.tsx implementation with proper state management and error handling. REQ-2 (footer heading consistency) is implemented in Footer.tsx with text-lg font-semibold styling matching the application design system. REQ-3 (mobile admin panel layout) is fixed in AdminPanel.tsx with responsive grid layout, horizontal scrolling, and shortened labels to prevent overlap.
